original_text: Jacob saw Rachel. She was the daughter of his uncle Laban. Jacob saw that she had Laban's sheep with her. So Jacob went to the well and he removed the big stone. Then he gave water to Laban's sheep.
korean_text: 야곱이 그의 외삼촌 라반의 딸 라헬과 그의 외삼촌의 양을 보고 나아가 우물 아귀에서 돌을 옮기고 외삼촌 라반의 양 떼에게 물을 먹이고

sentences.original_text: She was the daughter of his uncle Laban.
Jacob saw that she had Laban's sheep with her.
sentences.korean_translation: 야곱은 그녀와 함께 라반의 양들이 있는 것을 보았습니다.

sentences.original_text: So Jacob went to the well
and he removed the big stone.
Then he gave water to Laban's sheep.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 라반의 양들에게 물을 주었습니다.
